all_text_timv: Zambian Acapella. Zambian Acappella [sound recording]. Zambian Acapella Nashville, TN : Word/Epic, [1997] ℗1997 1 audio disc : digital ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Acappella artists Compact disc. Lyrics with English translations laid in container. A capella. Jesus is wonderful = Yesu Aliwama Amen -- Jesus is calling you = Akumcemani Yesu -- King of kings and Lord of lords -- This great multitude = Ilibumba Likalamba -- Standing on the mountain -- Jesus is coming back = Ba Jesus Bakubola -- Open the door = Julala Mulyango -- Josua fit da battle -- We're gathered together = Twbungana Bonse -- De animals a-comin. Produced by Gary Moyers. Performed by Zambian Acappella. Sung in Bemba, Tumbuka, English, or Tonga. Choruses, Sacred (Men's voices), Unaccompanied. Music Zambia. Hymns Zambia. Acappella artist series.
general_note_ssm: Lyrics with English translations laid in container.
